tests.name: global-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: global command - basic usage
set x 100
proc test {} {
    global x
    puts "x = $x"
}
test

tests.name: global-1.2
tests.script:
# Test: global command - modify global variable
set x 100
proc test {} {
    global x
    set x 200
}
test
puts "x = $x"

tests.name: global-1.3
tests.script:
# Test: global command - multiple variables
set a 1
set b 2
set c 3
proc test {} {
    global a b c
    puts "a=$a b=$b c=$c"
}
test

tests.name: uplevel-1.1
uplevel-1.2
uplevel-1.3
upvar-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: upvar command - basic usage
proc setvar {name value} {
    upvar 1 $name var
    set var $value
}
set x 0
setvar x 42
puts "x = $x"

tests.name: upvar-1.2
tests.script:
# Test: upvar command - default level is 1
proc setvar {name value} {
    upvar $name var
    set var $value
}
set x 0
setvar x 99
puts "x = $x"

tests.name: upvar-1.3
tests.script:
# Test: upvar command - level #0 refers to global
proc setglobal {name value} {
    upvar #0 $name var
    set var $value
}
set x 0
setglobal x 123
puts "x = $x"
